help.desc: Describes a command and how to use it.
help.dfUsage: Tell me how to use [command name]

addrole.desc: Adds a role to the list of user-assignable roles.
addrole.existingRole: was added to the list of user-assignable roles
addrole.notAdmin: Only admins can add existing roles to the user-assignable role list. However you can use this command to make a new user-assignable role.

getroles.desc: Get the list of user-assignable roles.

removerole.desc: Removes a role from the list of user-assignable roles.
removerole.success: was removed from the list of user-assignable roles

say.desc: Provide the bot a message to say.

setrole.success: done, you now have the role

unsetrole.success: done, you no longer have the role

meme.desc: Sends some of June's favorite memes

error.admin: i dont think youre allowed to do that
error.channel: cant do this here, ask me in a channel
error.not_found: sorry i dont know that command
error.role: i couldnt find that role sorry

flask: wake up babe, its time for your pill
pill time! also dont forget to get a refill if you need it
eat potassium, and dont forget refill pls
